[![](3.9-voter-model-with-mutation.png)](3.9-voter-model-with-mutation.png){style="float:left; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:5px;"} This model implements a simple voter model with two non-local processes. One admits succession at a distance, while the other (mutation) allows the appearance of completely new states in the lattice.
